EOH

Seo Jiho

Group (2015-2023):
offonoff

Introduction

EOH is a South Korean producer who debuted independently as a member of offonoff with Colde in 2016. He later debuted as a solo artist in 2020.

He is a part of the artist collective Club Eskimo, which consists of DEAN, Crush, Millic, Punchnello, Jusen, Chek Parren, 2xxx, Camper MISO and Colde.
